summary: REQ-45/46/47 appear implemented: backend loveLetter is initialized to empty and a migration resets existing state; frontend ValentineMessage now treats empty/whitespace love letters as an empty state with a prompt, editing starts from backend value (blank if empty), and includes a Clear control while keeping save/cancel flows.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend migration module and wired it into the actor to forcibly reset `loveLetter` to an empty string for existing installs.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-47 only requires fresh installs to start with an empty love letter. The BuildRequest allows adding backend/migration.mo only if required by a conditional migration policy, but the diff summary alone does not demonstrate that this migration was required versus optional.
